title: Strange Brigade
notes: It installs without problems. But after starting only a small black and non-movable window with unsteady border appears.

This game needs a lot of tweaking. You need to install xact to fix audio. You need to copy the vulkan.exe of the game & rename it to the regular executable. Then you need the launch options, "+r_renderapi 1 -nofriendsui -udp -skipdrivercheck"

(To keep this shorter). If you need help installing xact or just curious about the performance check out this guide/benchmark video.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gbjCItXmEDQ
title: Strange Brigade

notes:
To get it working I did the following


------------------------------------------ 
Set Steam Launch Options 
------------------------------------------ 

+r_renderapi 1 -nofriendsui -udp -skipdrivercheck 

------------------- 
Install Winetricks 
------------------- 

Arch:
sudo pacman -S winetricks 

Ubuntu:
sudo apt-get install winetricks 

---------------------------- 
Install Winetricks Xact 
---------------------------- 
Launch the game to create the compatdata folder for the game before running this command.  Force close the game (e.g. xkill the black game boot logo hang)

Go to the compatdata folder 

~/steamapps/compatdata/

open a commandline terminal from this location

~/steamapps/compatdata/

folder location and run

WINEPREFIX=~/312670/pfx winetricks xact 

------------------------------- 
Change Default game exe for the Vulkan version
 ------------------------------- 
go to the bin folder in the game folder 

~/steamapps/common/StrangeBrigade/bin/

remain "StrangeBrigade.exe" to "StrangeBrigade.exe.org"

create a backup of the Vulkan exe (StrangeBrigade_Vulkan.exe ---> StrangeBrigade_Vulkan (copy).exe)

renaim StrangeBrigade_Vulkan.exe to StrangeBrigade.exe

Play the game

Thanks to Venomous Pictures

TESTED

Installed the game, loaded the game, played the gain at high settings using Vilkan...game play was very smooth
title: Strange Brigade
